title: Crypto funds’ two-week inflow streak ends: Here’s what went wrong
contentSnippet: Onchain investors were more bearish to the Binance liquidity cascade, while crypto ETP traders have largely shrugged off the Friday crash, according to CoinShares.

title: Strategy Expands Bitcoin Holdings to 640,418 BTC With Latest Purchase
contentSnippet: The company financed the acquisition by raising $18.8 million through the issuance of various perpetual preferred shares and common stock

title: Wall Street Bank Citi Sees Stablecoins Powering Crypto’s Next Growth Phase
contentSnippet: Stablecoins are growing alongside crypto, lifting Ethereum while new networks loom and the dollar stays dominant.

title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC Reclaims $111K, ETH Tops $4K After Last Week’s Sell-Off
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and ether regained key support levels Monday, leading a broader market recovery that saw altcoins like LINK and FLOKI surge as sentiment improved.

title: BlackRock launches Bitcoin ETP after UK lifts trading ban
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin ETP debuts on the London Stock Exchange as UK regulators ease rules on crypto-linked investment products.

title: Amazon AWS outage knocks Coinbase mobile app offline, Robinhood disrupted
contentSnippet: This marks the second major Amazon AWS outage since April, when “connectivity issues” created usability problems for at least eight large crypto exchanges.

title: Dead cat bounce to $118K? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin rebounded into the new week as bulls were challenged to squeeze out shorts and avoid filling the $102,000 candle wick on Binance.

title: Bitcoin in ‘Reaccumulation Phase’ on Fed Easing Bets, Trump Tariff Shift: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 20, 2025

title: This Cohort Is the Main Force Behind Bitcoin’s Resistance in Price
contentSnippet: Holder behavior, not external factors, emerges as the primary source of selling pressure as older coins move and profits are realized.

title: What is Bitcoin if not crypto? Rumored Satoshi Nakamoto weighs in
contentSnippet: Jack Dorsey, long rumored to be Satoshi Nakamoto, reignited debate by declaring “Bitcoin is not crypto,” arguing BTC stands apart from other digital assets.

title: Bitcoin reaches $111K as classic chart pattern projects 70% gains next
contentSnippet: The recovery came as Bitcoin achieved a weekly close above $108,000, with the technical setup on the charts targeting significant gains ahead.

title: FRB、21日開催の暗号資産・決済会議の詳細を公表　サークル・コインベースら登壇へ
contentSnippet: 米FRBは10月21日開催の「Payments Innovation Conference」詳細を公表。ChainlinkやCircle、Coinbaseなど暗号資産関連企業が登壇予定。

title: NY Democrats Propose Companion Bill Targeting Proof-of-Work Mining
contentSnippet: Assembly Bill 9138 mirrors earlier Senate legislation imposing tiered excise taxes on energy-intensive crypto mining operations.

title: ChainLink Jumps 14% as Whales Accumulate $116M Worth of LINK Tokens Since Crash
contentSnippet: The token's rise comes amid fresh onchain accumulation, new institutional partnerships, and Chainlink Labs’ push into real-world asset infrastructure.

title: Aster’s quiet relisting on DefiLlama leaves ‘big gaps’ in data: Exec
contentSnippet: Aster’s return to DefiLlama came with missing historical data, leaving transparency questions unresolved across DeFi dashboards.

title: Michael Saylor Highlights Yield Gap Between STRF, STRD Preferred Stock Offerings
contentSnippet: Two preferred stocks with different payout priorities and risk profiles are creating a significant yield gap.

title: UK Bitcoin ETPs From BlackRock, Others Start Trading in London After FCA Ends Ban
contentSnippet: BlackRock exchange-traded product is already been listed on several European exchanges.

title: AIフュージョンキャピタル、ビットコインを追加購入　保有量30 BTCに
contentSnippet: AIフュージョンキャピタルグループは10月、約1億円分（6.13BTC）のビットコインを追加購入。累計購入額は約4億円、保有量は30.76BTC（時価約5億円）に到達。BitGoや博報堂と連携し、暗号資産運用を拡大している。

title: Crypto Traders Eye Major Events to Relieve Market Woes: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Oct. 20.

title: How to catch market manipulation in altcoins before they crash
contentSnippet: Crypto market manipulation involves organized efforts to artificially move altcoin prices and mislead traders about their true value.

title: Insider Testifies MIT Brothers Allegedly Planned $25M Crypto Heist for Months
contentSnippet: A former employee told jurors the brothers spent months preparing to exploit Ethereum's blockchain in a 12-second operation dubbed "Omakase."

title: コンヴァノ、ビットコイン売買で7億円の利益確保　ディーリング戦略で保有BTC拡大
contentSnippet: コンヴァノ（6574）はBTC高値売却・安値買戻しのトレーディング戦略で約7億円の利益を確保。保有量は665BTCに増加し、累計投資額は約114億円へ拡大。

title: Bittensor, Zcash Lead Altcoin Rebound as BNB Rally Cools
contentSnippet: Bittensor and Zcash are leading gains as traders rotate into high-beta assets, as analysts remain cautiously optimistic.

title: 88% of crypto airdrops flop, here’s how to break the curse
contentSnippet: Jackson Denka, CEO of Azura, believes crypto airdrops will eventually take a backseat to IPO’s, but what if there was a way to save them?

title: Bitcoin’s next rally will start once OGs finish selling: Analysts
contentSnippet: Long-term Bitcoin holders took profits at record levels with realized gains hitting $1.7 billion daily as older coins re-entered circulation.

title: Bitcoin Jumps Past $111K, XRP, SOL, ETH Rally as Japanese Shares Hit Record High
contentSnippet: On-chain data offered bullish cues to bitcoin.

title: NY市長選クオモ候補、仮想通貨振興へ新ポスト創設を公約
contentSnippet: ニューヨーク市長選候補のクオモ氏が暗号資産振興へ新ポスト創設を公約。最高技術革新責任者とイノベーション評議会を設置し、AI・ブロックチェーン・バイオテクノロジーの3分野で市を先導する方針を表明。ウォール街を擁するニューヨークの暗号資産政策に注目集まる。

title: Has Bitcoin Bottomed? Here's What the Experts Say
contentSnippet: Analysts believe Bitcoin is forming a local bottom as the Fed pivots toward rate cuts, though U.S.-China trade tensions remain a key risk.

title: 仮想通貨マイナー株価、ビットコイン上回る上昇　AIシフト背景に
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨マイニング企業のパフォーマンスが年初来2.5倍超上昇しビットコインを上回っている。アイリスエナジーやサイファーマイニングなどAI・HPC事業への転換が株価上昇の背景だ。

title: Beijing Halts Tech Giants' Stablecoin Ambitions in Hong Kong: FT
contentSnippet: Mainland officials have paused efforts from two top tech companies to establish stablecoin businesses in Hong Kong.

title: 中国IT大手、当局介入でステーブルコイン計画を中断＝FT紙
contentSnippet: 中国政府が複数のテック大手による香港でのステーブルコイン発行計画に介入。人民銀行は民間通貨発行やデジタル人民元への影響を懸念。香港は5月に世界初の包括的規制を施行したばかり。

title: 仮想通貨トレジャリー企業の”錬金術”時代は終焉か＝10x Research見解
contentSnippet: 10x Researchが仮想通貨トレジャリー企業のNAV暴落を分析した。ストラテジーやメタプラネットなどのDATは新たなビットコイン戦略への転換を迫られていると解説している。

title: Polymarket Airdrop Farmers Have Become 'More Sophisticated' as Token Launch Looms
contentSnippet: Polymarket users have changed up their techniques for farming a potential airdrop as sources say a crypto token launch has been confirmed.

title: Professor Coin: Bitcoin, Energy and the Future of Sustainable Crypto
contentSnippet: Research into Bitcoin’s energy use has extended to mining’s total environmental cost and whether it can accelerate the green transition.

title: What Is World Liberty Financial? The Trump Family DeFi Project Explained
contentSnippet: The U.S. President's biggest crypto venture is a DeFi project promising to help the unbanked. But how does it work?

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ビットコイン市場回復の鍵やリップル社の事業拡大など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、BNB、XRPなどの主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: 金融庁、銀行の仮想通貨投資解禁を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: 金融庁が銀行によるビットコインなど仮想通貨の投資目的での取得・保有を可能にする制度改正を検討しているようだ。銀行グループの仮想通貨交換業者登録も可能にし、個人投資家の環境整備を図る。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜バイナンスのユーザーへの救済金配布やメタプラネットの企業価値指標低下に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、トランプ・ショックを受けた仮想通貨取引所バイナンスによるユーザー補償、メタプラネットの企業価値指標mNAVの低下に関する記事が最も関心を集めた。

title: Wikipedia Traffic Drops as AI Answers Eat the Free Encyclopedia
contentSnippet: The Wikimedia Foundation revealed an unsettling trend: search engines and chatbots are providing Wikipedia's content directly to users without sending them to the site.

title: Circuit Breakers in DeFi? Why Experts Say Managing Chaos On-Chain Isn't That Easy
contentSnippet: Crypto prices plummeted last week as liquidations fueled historic volatility. Experts say that Wall Street’s safety net wouldn’t have helped.
